ygData.subject: Re: Paw Corpse Retrieval was Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have seen other monsters fighting monsters but only when someone has charmed them (probably what happened with the grizzly fighting the hill giant,  and
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have seen other monsters fighting monsters but only when
someone has charmed them (probably what happened with the
grizzly fighting the hill giant, and the lions attack anything that
is bi-pedal :) ). This was beyond unpredictable. Ghanex just
stands there and summons his pets. I never seen a pet turn
on its owner before.

> ----------
> From: Jynxx[SMTP:Jynxx@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 1:19 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Paw Corpse Retrieval was Executioners Axe
>
> From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
>
> In regards to Ghanex's zombies attacking him....
>
> You have to remember the AI that they have on these things. Who knows?
> They
> could have broken the spell that entraped them, or they could just have
> gotten pissed off at him. I see monsters fighting monsters all the time. A
> griz was fighting a hill giant the other day in W. Karana, and in the same
> day I saw a lion take out one of the two farmers. All I'm saying is, they
> made the monsters AI very unpredictable, and that is the result.
>
> Tyveris,
> Aspiring Samurai
>
